data.text: @TravellingTabby It rife but no one cares now.. And we are as good as fully un protecting our self's. Wounder how much people are getting twice
@TravellingTabby Just for clarity - around 75% of these 1,636 are NOT being treated for Covid and are in hospital because of other conditions.
@TravellingTabby Feels like the Denmark story playing out. Massive rises due to BA2, deaths rising, schools hit hard. Scary days ahead.
@TravellingTabby Infections in schools = infections in the 25-44 age range too.

@d_masser @alex7471 @TravellingTabby Northern Ireland I’m sure was reporting high case numbers before us & it was said to be BA.2 & their cases are coming down.NHS Grampian health chief said on STV news that it was BA.2 and waining vaccine esp. 55+ yr group.4th vaccine likely required for all in Autumn/later summer.

@alex7471 @TravellingTabby Well #BorisJohnson is pretending it's gone away.
Regs still tighter up here. But not for long.
@TravellingTabby Ouch we have a steeply rising infection rate!
@TravellingTabby 4 of them are in my house.

@alex7471 @TravellingTabby From ONS Scotland has been rising for some weeks, England likely to show increases tomorrow too after re ent falls ….not sure why Scotland has been the outlier recently. https://t.co/Ol34BKUWGj
